analysis.description:
DecisionToken.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/1/0x554c20b7c486beee439277b4540a434566dc4c02.sol#392-397) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(triggerTime == 0)

DecisionTokenSale.DecisionTokenSale (/unique_chucks/1/0x554c20b7c486beee439277b4540a434566dc4c02.sol#465-476) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(owner,tokenReserve) (/unique_chucks/1/0x554c20b7c486beee439277b4540a434566dc4c02.sol#476)

DecisionTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x554c20b7c486beee439277b4540a434566dc4c02.sol#489-509) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0x554c20b7c486beee439277b4540a434566dc4c02.sol#503-504)

DecisionTokenSale.destroy (/unique_chucks/1/0x554c20b7c486beee439277b4540a434566dc4c02.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/1/0x554c20b7c486beee439277b4540a434566dc4c02.sol)
